reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 389/95: APPLICATION OF NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATIONS ACT, 2010
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 389/95: APPLICATION OF NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATIONS ACT, 2010
reg_info.act_under: Centennial Centre of Science and Technology Act

content.content: 1. For the sole purpose of borrowing money from the Province of Ontario or a provincial agency, subsection 15 (1) of the Not-for-Profit Corporations Act, 2010 applies to the Centre. O. Reg. 559/21, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 1. For the sole purpose of borrowing money from the Province of Ontario or a provincial agency, subsection 15 (1) of the Not-for-Profit Corporations Act, 2010 applies to the Centre. O. Reg. 559/21, s. 2.
